name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made with Her
storyline: Uesugi Futaro, a second-year high school student living in poverty, is offered a part-time job as a private tutor with favorable conditions. However, his student is a classmate! And they are quintuplets! All of them are beautiful girls, but all of them are problem children who are "on the verge of failing school" and "hate studying! The first task is to win the trust of the sisters...! Every day is a festival! The Nakano family's quintuplets present a five-person, five-color love comedy with 500% cuteness!
summary: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Promises Made with Her is the third The Quintessential Quintuplets romance visual novel developed by MAGES. The theme this time is “heart-pounding summer vacation dates.” As for what kind of story will unfold this time, more information will be shared in future announcements.
